General.Name: Cake Box Holdings PLC
General.Description: Cake Box Holdings Plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail of fresh cream cakes in the United Kingdom. It offers cakes by celebration, cakes by design, and seasonal cakes, as well as wedding cakes. The company engages in the property rental activities. Cake Box Holdings Plc was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 20-22 Jute Lane, London, United Kingdom, EN3 7PJ
